description.value:
Skysent ixudo tend to have more warm colorations and average a few inches shorter than the average ixudo.

The middle class of ixudo cultures, skysent are often given central society roles like crafters, squad leaders, and merchants.

system.classDetails:
Skysent Ixudo Traits

  • Compatibility: Avian
  • Attribute Increase: Your Presence increases by 1.
  • Skill Proficiency: You have proficiency in one Intelligence or Presence skill of your choice.
  • Trade Proficiency: You are proficient in one Trade your choice.
